article.bibl: A balloon message released in 1850 or 1851 from John Ross's Felix, but probably printed on board Horatio Austin's Resolute. Printed on white silk. Actual size: 37 x 83 mm. (From a private collection.)

Broadside printed on board Horatio Austin's Resolute in December 1850. Printed on green wove paper. Actual size: 385 x 187 mm. (By permission of the Rare Book Division, National Library of Canada/Division des livres rares, Bibliotheque nationale du Canada.)

Playbill printed on board Horatio Austin's Resolute in February 1851. Printed on pale pink wove paper. Actual size: 573 x 252 mm. (By permission of the Rare Book Division, National Library of Canada/ Division des livres rares, Bibliothbque nationale du Canada.)

Broadside printed on board Henry Kellett's Resolute in January 1853- Printed on yellow wove paper. Actual size: 356 x 2z5 mm. (By permission of the National Archives of Canada/Archives nationales du Canada.)

Playbill printed on board Edward Belcher's Assistance in November 1852. Printed on white silk. Actual size: 437 x 340 mm. (By permission of the Rare Book Division, National Library of Canada/Division des livres rares, Bibliotheque nationale du Canada.)

Broadside printed on board Edward Belcher's Assistance in January 1853. Printed on white laid paper. Actual size: 445 X 290 mm. (Courtesy of the Rare Book Division, National Library of Canada/Division des livres rares, Bibliothbque nationale du Canada.)

Broadside announcement printed on board the Plover in December 1852. Printed on white laid paper. Actual size: 204 x 161 mm. (Courtesy of the Rare Book, Manuscript, and Special Collections Library, Duke University.)
